```{ojs}
data = FileAttachment("Carefirst-PPO_negotiated_price_range.csv.gz").csv({ typed: true })
```

```{ojs}
viewof maxprice = Inputs.range(
  [0, 100000], 
  {value: 35, step: 10, label: "Max negotiated price:"}
)
viewof minprice = Inputs.range(
  [0, 100000], 
  {value: 0, step: 10, label: "Min negotiated price:"}
)
```

```{ojs}
filtered = data.filter(function(procedure) {
  return maxprice > procedure.max_negotiated_price & minprice < procedure.min_negotiated_price
})
```

```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
  inset: 8,
  grid: true,
  color: {
    legend: true,
  },
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(filtered, {x: "min_negotiated_price", y: "max_negotiated_price"})
  ]
})
```
